migration-v8-move-document.description: Migrates DOCUMENT Injection token from platform-browser imports to common import

migration-v8-static-queries.description: Migrates ViewChild and ContentChild to explicit query timing

migration-v8-template-local-variables.description: Warns developers if values are assigned to template variables

migration-v9-renderer-to-renderer2.description: Migrates usages of Renderer to Renderer2

migration-v9-missing-injectable.description: Decorates all declared undecorated provider classes with @Injectable

migration-v9-undecorated-classes-with-di.description: Decorates undecorated base classes of directives/components that use dependency injection. Copies metadata from base classes to derived directives/components/pipes that are not decorated.

migration-v9-undecorated-classes-with-de.description: Adds an Angular decorator to undecorated classes that have decorated fields

migration-v9-dynamic-queries.description: Removes the `static` flag from dynamic queries.
